Sister of Silence Eris: You're currently talking to the part of my soul. We can say that you're talking to my ghost. Believe me, I remember all the events that have occurred to me before my death. And now I would like to hear the reason why you came here. [Quest Q10294_SevenSignsToTheMonasteryOfSilence eris_q10294_4.htm|To get the original book "The Life of Holly Solina Elmoreden".]
